meta.title: PlaylistWizard - Easily manage and organize your playlists on the web! | Playlist Manager
meta.description: You can easily manage and organize your playlists. PlaylistWizard supports multiple platforms, including YouTube and Spotify. With features like copy, merge, shuffle, and more, you can enhance your music experience.

header.which-provider: Which provider do you want to sign in with?

terms-agreement.title: Agreement to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
terms-agreement.content: Do you agree to the <1>Terms of Service</1> and <2>Privacy Policy</2> after reviewing them?

playlists.title: Your Playlists
playlists.description: Manage and organize your YouTube and Spotify playlists

target.title: Target Playlist
target.description: Select a destination playlist or create a new one.

allow-duplicates.title: Allow Duplicates
allow-duplicates.description: When checked, allows the same song to be added to the playlist multiple times.

copy.title: Copy Playlist
copy.description: You can specify copy settings. Hover over settings to see details.

merge.title: Merge Playlists
merge.description: Select the playlists you want to merge. Duplicates will be removed unless you choose to keep them.

extract.title: Extract Playlist Items
extract.description: You can specify extraction settings. Hover over settings to see details.

artist.title: Artist
artist.description: Select the artists you want to extract from the playlist.

import.title: Import Playlists
import.subtitle: Import playlists from other users
import.description: You can import playlists created by others. Just enter the playlist URL and click Import. The playlist must be public.
import.invalid-specify: Invalid URL or ID. Please check the format.

hero.title: Simpler Playlist Management
hero.description: With PlaylistWizard, easily manage your YouTube and Spotify playlists. Supporting multiple platforms with features like copy, merge, and shuffle to enhance your music experience.

features.title: Take Playlist Management to the Next Level
features.description: PlaylistWizard offers powerful features to enhance your music experience across multiple music platforms.

import.title: Import Playlists
import.description: Add playlists created by others to your account.

copy.title: Copy Playlists
copy.description: Easily copy your favorite playlists to create new versions while keeping the originals intact.

merge.title: Merge Playlists
merge.description: Combine multiple playlists into one to create the ultimate collection. Duplicates are automatically removed (but you can keep them if you want!).

shuffle.title: Shuffle Playlists
shuffle.description: Randomly shuffle the order of songs in your playlist for a fresh listening experience.

delete.title: Delete Playlists
delete.description: Easily remove unwanted playlists to keep your library organized.

search.title: Search Items
search.description: Quickly find specific songs or artists within your playlists to locate your favorite music.

multi-platform.title: Multi-Platform Support
multi-platform.description: Supports YouTube and Spotify. Manage your playlists on your preferred music platforms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some common questions and answers about PlaylistWizard.

what-is-pw.question: What is PlaylistWizard?
what-is-pw.answer: PlaylistWizard is a web application that allows you to manage and organize your playlists!

is-pw-free.question: Is PlaylistWizard free to use?
is-pw-free.answer: Yes, PlaylistWizard is completely free to use. Additionally, the application is open source, and you can view the complete source code and run it locally on <1>GitHub</1>.

supported-platforms.question: Which platforms are supported?
supported-platforms.answer: Currently, PlaylistWizard only supports YouTube. Spotify integration is implemented and will be available once the review process is complete.

transfer-playlists.question: Can I transfer playlists between different platforms?
transfer-playlists.answer: This feature is planned for the future, but it's not available at the moment.

will-my-playlists-be-changed.question: Will my playlists be changed?
will-my-playlists-be-changed.answer: Some operations may modify your original playlists. However, many operations like copy and merge are set to create new playlists by default. You can choose the target playlist in the settings for each operation.

is-my-data-safe.question: Is my data safe?
is-my-data-safe.answer: We take privacy very seriously. PlaylistWizard does not collect, store, or share any personally identifiable information. For more details, please refer to our <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

can-i-disconnect.question: Can I disconnect my Spotify/YouTube account?
can-i-disconnect.answer: Yes. You can disconnect your Spotify/YouTube account by clicking the sign-out button in the top right corner. You can also disconnect through each service's settings.

feature-req.question: How can I request a new feature?
feature-req.answer: We welcome feature requests. Please submit your request through <1>GitHub Issue</1>.

bug-report.question: How can I report a bug?
bug-report.answer: To report a bug, please submit it through <1>GitHub Issue</1>.

import.different-service: Cannot import playlists from different services. Please enter playlists from the same service.
